name: Monster House (itch) (Space Castle Games)
description:
You must destroy the beast before it kills you. 

1. Find the 3 orbs and pick them up with 'e'
2. Drop them 'q' in a triangle shape and lure the beast into the middle of the triangle to kill it.
Move: WASD
Look: Mouse
Pick up orb: 'e' 
Drop orb: 'q'
